description: Edit a given status to change its text, sensitivity, media attachments, or poll. Note that editing a pollâ€™s options will reset the votes.

request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the Status in the database.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

request.name: status
request.comment: String. The plain text content of the status.

request.name: spoiler_text
request.comment: String. The plain text subject or content warning of the status.

request.name: sensitive
request.comment: Boolean. Whether the status should be marked as sensitive.

request.name: language
request.comment: String. ISO 639 language code for the status.

request.name: media_ids[]
request.comment: Array of String. Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, status becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

request.name: poll[options][]
request.comment: Array of String. Possible answers to the poll. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[expires_in] must be provided.

request.name: poll[expires_in]
request.comment: Integer. Duration that the poll should be open, in seconds. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[options] must be provided.

request.name: poll[multiple]
request.comment: Boolean. Allow multiple choices? Defaults to false.

request.name: poll[hide_totals]
request.comment: Boolean. Hide vote counts until the poll ends? Defaults to false.
